AT.name: Beyblade Evolution
AT.description: Mach dich bereit, mit Beyblade Evolution auf dem Nintendo 3DS™ noch tiefer in die Action einzutauchen, als du es dir jemals vorgestellt hast: Let it rip! • Nutze die Bewegungssteuerung des Nintendo 3DS™, und sei so nah am Geschehen, wie noch nie zuvor! • Erlebe eine spannende Geschichte in der Welt von Beyblade: Tritt gegen bekannte Helden und Schurken an und werde der beste Blader. • Sammle massenhaft einzigartige Bey-Teile und kombiniere sie, um den perfekten Bey zu bauen, den du dann auf deine Gegner loslassen kannst! • Tritt im lokalen Spiel gegen Freunde an, oder sammle StreetPass™-Daten, um gegen andere Spieler antreten zu können! • Nutze die mitgelieferte AR-Karte, um Kämpfe in einer virtuellen Arena auszutragen! • Erfahre mehr über die Zukunft, indem du den allmächtigen Beyblade Samurai Ifrit W145CF aus Beyblade: Shogun Steel freischaltest! • Die Sammlerausgabe von Beyblade Evolution kommt mit einem exklusiven Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, der niemals im Handel erhältlich sein wird.

AU.name: Beyblade Evolution
AU.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

BG.name: Beyblade Evolution
BG.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

BE.name: Beyblade Evolution
BE.description: Prépare-toi à connaître les sensations fortes des combats de Beyblade Evolution qui t'attendent sur Nintendo 3DS™ ! • Utilise les commandes par mouvement de ta Nintendo 3DS™ pour vivre des batailles encore plus vraies que nature ! • Découvre l'histoire fascinante du monde de Beyblade où tu affronteras des ennemis bien connus pour devenir le champion Blader. • Récupère un nombre incalculable de pièces de toupies et combine-les pour créer ta toupie idéale, puis utilise-la pour venir à bout de tes adversaires ! • Affronte tes amis en mode multijoueur local ou récupère des données StreetPass™ pour combattre d'autres joueurs ! • Utilise la carte RA fournie avec le jeu et livre des combats dans une arène virtuelle ! • Lève le voile sur le futur qui t'attend en débloquant la puissante Beyblade Samurai Ifrit W145CF de Beyblade: Shogun Steel ! • L'édition collector de Beyblade Evolution s'accompagne en exclusivité de la Beyblade Winged Pegasus 90WF qui ne sera disponible à la vente nulle part ailleurs !

EE.name: Beyblade Evolution
EE.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

ES.name: Beyblade Evolution
ES.description: ¡Prepárate para participar en Beyblade Evolution, un juego de batallas como nunca antes habías visto para Nintendo 3DS! • ¡Utiliza los controles de movimiento de Nintendo 3DS y experimenta el realismo en estado puro! • Disfruta de una excitante historia en el mundo de Beyblade dónde tendrás que enfrentarte a conocidos héroes y villanos para llegar a ser el campeón Blader. • Consigue un gran número de piezas Bey y combínalas para construir el Bey perfecto, y usarlo para aplastar a los adversarios! • ¡Enfréntate a tus amigos jugando al modo multijugador local o recupera los datos de StreetPass para desafiar a otros jugadores! • ¡Utiliza la Tarjeta RA que viene con el juego y lucha en una arena virtual! • Echa un vistazo al futuro desbloqueando la poderosa Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade de Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • ¡La edición coleccionista de Beyblade Evolution viene con un exclusivo Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, que no podrás comprar en ningún otro sitio!

NO.name: Beyblade Evolution
NO.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

NL.name: Beyblade Evolution
NL.description: Ervaar meer actie dan ooit tevoren – let it rip met Beyblade Evolution op Nintendo 3DS™! • Gebruik de bewegingsbesturingen van Nintendo 3DS™ en ervaar levensechte acties! • Beleef een spannend verhaal in de wereld van Beyblade als je het opneemt tegen bekende helden en schurken om een Bladerkampioen te worden. • Verzamel tal van unieke Bey-onderdelen en combineer ze met elkaar om de perfecte Bey te bouwen en de oppositie te verpletteren! • Neem het op tegen je vrienden via Local Play of verzamel StreetPass™-gegevens om tegen andere spelers te vechten! • Gebruik de AR-kaart die bij de game is ingesloten en vecht in een virtuele arena! • Werp alvast een blik op de toekomst door de oppermachtige Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade van Beyblade te ontgrendelen: Shogun Steel! • De Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution bevat een exclusieve Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade die je nooit ergens anders zult kunnen kopen!

NZ.name: Beyblade Evolution
NZ.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

PL.name: Beyblade Evolution
PL.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

PT.name: Beyblade Evolution
PT.description: Prepare-se para sentir a ação da batalha de perto – está na hora de let it rip com o Beyblade Evolution no Nintendo 3DS™! • Use os controles de movimento do Nintendo 3DS™ para se experimentar o jogo de verdade como nunca antes! • Viva uma emocionante história no mundo de Beyblade enquanto enfrenta heróis e vilões conhecidos para se tornar o Blader campeão! • Junte um grande número de peças e combine-as para construir o Bey perfeito, e use-o para esmagar seus adversários! • Encare seus amigos usando o modo de jogo local ou receba dados do StreetPass™ para enfrentar outros jogadores! • Use o Cartão RA que acompanha o jogo para lutar em um arena virtual! • Tenha um gostinho do futuro desbloqueando o poderoso Samurai Ifrit W145CF do Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • A Edição de Colecionador do Beyblade Evolution vem com um exclusivo Winged Pegasus 90WF, que nunca estará disponível para compra em qualquer outro lugar!

RU.name: Beyblade Evolution
RU.description: Приготовься приблизиться к экшену еще больше, чем когда-либо ранее. Начинай вместе с Beyblade Evolution на Nintendo 3DS™! • Используй элементы управления Nintendo 3DS™, чтобы приблизиться к реальной игре еще больше, чем когда-либо ранее! • Стань свидетелем захватывающей истории в мире бейблэйда, вступив в противостояние с уже знакомыми тебе героями и злодеями, чтобы стать блэйдером-чемпионом. • Собери огромное количество компонентов для волчков и комбинируй их, чтобы создать идеальный волчок, с помощью которого ты сокрушишь соперников! • Вступи в противостояние со своими друзьями в локальная игра или собирай данные StreetPass™ для поединков с другими игроками! • Воспользуйся входящей в комплект игры карта AR для сражений на виртуальной арене! • Тайком загляни в будущее, разблокировав мощный бейблэйд Samurai Ifrit W145CF из Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • Коллекционное издание Beyblade Evolution содержит эксклюзивный бейблэйд Winged Pegasus 90WF, который никогда и нигде больше нельзя будет купить!

SE.name: Beyblade Evolution
SE.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!

RO.description: Prepare to get closer to the battling action than ever before – it’s time to let it rip with Beyblade Evolution on Nintendo 3DS™! • Use the motion controls of Nintendo 3DS™ and get closer to playing for real than ever before! • Experience an exciting story in the world of Beyblade as you face off against familiar heroes and villains to become a champion Blader. • Collect a huge number of unique Bey parts and combine them to build the perfect Bey, then use it to smash the opposition! • Face off against your friends using Local Play, or collect StreetPass™ data to battle other players! • Use the AR Card packaged with the game and do battle in a virtual arena! • Get a sneak peek at the future by unlocking the all-powerful Samurai Ifrit W145CF Beyblade from Beyblade: Shogun Steel! • The Collector’s Edition of Beyblade Evolution comes with an exclusive Winged Pegasus 90WF Beyblade, which will never be available to buy anywhere else!
